00046 // A test function.
00047 void Annotation::test()
00048 {
00049     AffxString strFileNameIn = "c:/annotation/apt-cyto-annot-chipc.txt";
00050     std::string strFileName = "c:/annotation/cyto2_HG49m_C.annot.a5";
00051     affx::File5_File file5;
00052     file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_CREATE | affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00053     affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("Annotation", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00054     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Annotation", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00055     tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "probeset_id", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, 40);
00056     tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "Chromosome", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00057     tsv5->defineColumn(0, 2, "Position", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00058     tsv5->defineColumn(0, 3, "GC", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00059     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00060     tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00061     AffxByteArray baLine;
00062     AffxByteArray baColumn;
00063 
00064     AffxString strCol1, strCol2;
00065     int iCol3 = 0;
00066     double dCol4 = 0.0;
00067     
00068     tsv.open(strFileNameIn);
00069     tsv.bind(0,0,&strCol2,  affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00070     tsv.bind(0,1,&strCol2,  affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00071     tsv.bind(0,2,&iCol3,  affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00072     tsv.bind(0,3,&dCol4,  affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00073     
00074     while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00075       tsv5->set_string(0, 0, strCol1);
00076       strCol2 = strCol2.substring(3);
00077       if (strCol2 == "X") {tsv5->set_i(0, 1, 24);}
00078       else if (strCol2 == "Y") {tsv5->set_i(0, 1, 25);}
00079       else {tsv5->set_i(0, 1, ::getInt(strCol2));}
00080       tsv5->set_i(0, 2, iCol3);
00081       tsv5->set_d(0, 3, dCol4);
00082       tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00083     }
00084     tsv.clear();
00085     tsv5->close();
00086     delete tsv5;
00087     group5->close();
00088     delete group5;
00089     file5.close();
00090 }

00106 /**
00107  * @brief Setup a display string from the run time.
00108  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the action we are timing.
00109  * @param time_t - The run time in seconds.
00110  * @return AffxString - The resulting string
00111  */
00112 AffxString Annotation::runTime(const AffxString& strAction, time_t runTime)
00113 {
00114     AffxString str = "";
00115     double dRunTime = (double)runTime;
00116 
00117     if (dRunTime < 60)
00118     {
00119         str = strAction + "  Run time = ";
00120         str += ::getDouble(dRunTime, 3, true);
00121         str += " seconds";
00122     }
00123     else if (dRunTime < (60 * 60))
00124     {
00125         str = strAction + "  Run time = ";
00126         str += ::getDouble((dRunTime) / 60, 3, true);
00127         str += " minutes";
00128     }
00129     else
00130     {
00131         str = strAction + "  Run time = ";
00132         str += ::getDouble((dRunTime) / (60 * 60), 3, true);
00133         str += " hours";
00134     }
00135     return str;
00136 }
00137 
00138 void Annotation::loadAnnotationForCopynumber(   BaseEngine& engine,
00139                                                 bool bNewProbeSets,
00140                                                 AffxSplitArray<CNProbeSet> &vProbeSets,
00141                                                 AffxArray<CNProbeSet>& arProbeSets)
00142 {
00143         time_t startTime = time(NULL);
00144     if ((engine.isOptDefined("annotation-file")) && (engine.getOpt("annotation-file") != ""))
00145     {
00146         if (bNewProbeSets) {Annotation().newCNProbeSetsSQLite(engine, vProbeSets);}
00147         else {Annotation().loadAnnotationSQLite(engine, arProbeSets);}
00148     }
00149     else
00150     {
00151         Err::errAbort("annotation-file parameter has not been specified.");
00152     }
00153         time_t endTime = time(NULL);
00154     Verbose::out(1, runTime("Load NetAffx", endTime - startTime));
00155 }

00157 bool Annotation::isCytoScanHD(const std::string& strFileName)
00158 {
00159         bool bCytoScanHD = false;   
00160     AffxString strSQL = "select probeSet_ID, chr_id, start, Percent_GC, chrx_par, Chromosome.shortname, enzyme_fragment, process_flag, probe_count, probeset_type, probe_gc_a from Annotations, Chromosome where Annotations.chr_id = Chromosome.key and process_flag > 0";
00161     SQLiteDatabase db;
00162         try 
00163         {
00164                 db.open(strFileName);
00165                 SQLiteRecordset rset(db);
00166                 try {rset.open(strSQL); rset.close(); bCytoScanHD = true;} catch(...) {}
00167                 db.close();
00168     }
00169     catch (...) {db.close();}
00170         return bCytoScanHD;
00171 }

00173 void Annotation::newCNProbeSetsSQLite(BaseEngine& engine, AffxSplitArray<CNProbeSet> &vProbeSets)
00174 {
00175     Verbose::out(3, "Annotation::newCNProbeSets");
00176     int iXChromosome = engine.getOptInt("xChromosome");
00177     int iYChromosome = engine.getOptInt("yChromosome");
00178     AffxString strFileName = engine.getOpt("annotation-file");
00179     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName)) {return newCNProbeSetsHDF5(engine, vProbeSets);}
00180     bool bEnzymes = !((engine.isOptDefined("cyto2")) && (engine.getOptBool("cyto2")));
00181     AffxArray<AffxString> vStyAdapters;
00182     AffxArray<AffxString> vNspAdapters;
00183     vProbeSets.clear();
00184     m_vParams.clear();
00185 
00186     AffxArray<AffxString> arRestrictList;
00187     bool bRestrictList = (engine.getOpt("probeset-ids") != "");
00188     if (bRestrictList)
00189     {
00190         loadProbeSetNamesFromRestrictList(engine, arRestrictList);
00191     }
00192 
00193     AffxByteArray ba;
00194     AffxString str;
00195     AffxString strProbeSetName;
00196     bool bSnpInterference = false;
00197     int iSearchIndex = 0;
00198     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00199     unsigned int uiProbeSetIndex = 0;
00200     AffxString strSQL1;
00201     AffxString strSQL2;
00202     AffxString strSQL3;
00203     unsigned int uiRowCount = 0;
00204     try {
00205     open(strFileName);
00206     SQLiteRecordset rset(*this);
00207 
00208     strSQL2 = "select key, value from information";
00209     rset.open(strSQL2);
00210     int iKeyCount = 0;
00211     while (rset.fetch())
00212     {
00213         ba.assign(rset.getString(0));
00214         ba.replace(" ", "-");
00215         ba.replace("_", "-");
00216         ba.replace("netaffx-annotation-netaffx-build", "netaffx-build");
00217         if (ba.equals("genome-version-ucsc")) {iKeyCount++;}
00218         if (ba.equals("dbsnp-version")) {iKeyCount++;}
00219         if (ba.equals("netaffx-build")) {iKeyCount++;}
00220         param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-algorithm-param-" + ba.toString()));
00221         param.SetValueAscii(rset.getString(1));
00222         m_vParams.push_back(param);
00223     }
00224     rset.close();
00225     if (iKeyCount < 3) {throw(Except("The annotation file must contain all three of these parameters: genome-version-ucsc, dbsnp-version, and netaffx-build"));}
00226 
00227     bool bCyto2 = false;        
00228         bool bCytoScanHD = false;
00229     strSQL1 = "select count(*) from Annotations, Chromosome where Annotations.chr_id = Chromosome.key and process_flag > 0";
00230     strSQL2 = "select count(*) from Annotations, Chromosome where Annotations.chr_id = Chromosome.key and in_final_list = 1";
00231     try {
00232         rset.open(strSQL1);
00233         bCyto2 = true;
00234     } catch (...) {
00235         rset.open(strSQL2);
00236         bCyto2 = false;
00237     }
00238     if (rset.fetch())
00239     {
00240         uiRowCount = rset.getInteger(0);
00241     }
00242     rset.close();
00243 
00244     strSQL1 = "select probeSet_ID, chr_id, start, Percent_GC, chrx_par, Chromosome.shortname, process_flag, probe_count, ProbeSet_Type  from Annotations, Chromosome where Annotations.chr_id = Chromosome.key and process_flag > 0";
00245     strSQL2 = "select probeSet_ID, chr_id, start, Percent_GC, chrx_par, Chromosome.shortname, enzyme_fragment, snp_interference from Annotations, Chromosome where Annotations.chr_id = Chromosome.key and in_final_list = 1";
00246     strSQL3 = "select probeSet_ID, chr_id, start, Percent_GC, chrx_par, Chromosome.shortname, enzyme_fragment, process_flag, probe_count, probeset_type, probe_gc_a, fragment_gc from Annotations, Chromosome where Annotations.chr_id = Chromosome.key and process_flag > 0";
00247     if (uiRowCount > 1)
00248     {
00249         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Annotation::newCNProbeSetsSQLite(...) ", (uiRowCount / 100000), 1, (uiRowCount / 100000));
00250         vProbeSets.allocate(uiRowCount);
00251 
00252                 try {
00253             rset.open(strSQL3);
00254             bCyto2 = false;
00255             bCytoScanHD = true;
00256         }
00257                 catch(...) 
00258                 {
00259                         try {
00260                 rset.open(strSQL1);
00261                 bCyto2 = true;
00262             }
00263                         catch(...) 
00264                         {
00265                                 rset.open(strSQL2);
00266                 bCyto2 = false;
00267                         }
00268                 }
00269         
00270         CovariateParams::determineCovariateMap(engine);
00271         int fragmentAdapterTypeIndex = CovariateParams::mapCovariateNameToIndex("fragment-adapter-type");
00272         int fragmentLengthIndex = CovariateParams::mapCovariateNameToIndex("fragment-length");
00273         int fragmentGCIndex = CovariateParams::mapCovariateNameToIndex("fragment-gc");
00274         int probeGCIndex = CovariateParams::mapCovariateNameToIndex("probe-gc");
00275         int localGCIndex = CovariateParams::mapCovariateNameToIndex("local-gc");
00276         int markerClassIndex = CovariateParams::mapCovariateNameToIndex("marker-class");
00277 
00278 
00279         AffxString strChromosome;
00280         char cChromosome = 0;
00281         int i = 0;
00282         bool bInWorkflowEngine = (!(engine.isOptDefined("cyto2") && engine.getOptBool("cyto2")) && !engine.getOptBool("cytoscan-hd"));
00283         while (rset.fetch())
00284         {
00285             if ((i % 100000) == 0) {Verbose::progressStep(1);}
00286             i++;
00287             strChromosome = rset.getString(5);
00288             if (strChromosome.length() > 0) {cChromosome = strChromosome.getAt(0);}
00289             strProbeSetName = rset.getString(0);
00290             strProbeSetName.removeSurroundingQuotes();
00291             CNProbeSet* p = vProbeSets.getAt(uiProbeSetIndex);
00292             if (arRestrictList.getCount() > 0)
00293             {
00294                 iSearchIndex = arRestrictList.binarySearch(strProbeSetName, 0);
00295                 if (iSearchIndex == -1) {p->setProcess(false);}
00296                 else {p->setProcess(true);}
00297             }
00298 
00299             p->setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
00300             std::string strProbeSetType;
00301                         if (bCyto2)
00302                         {
00303                                 p->setProcessFlag(rset.getInteger(6));
00304                                 strProbeSetType = rset.getString(8);
00305                                 if(strProbeSetType == "SNP")
00306                                 {
00307                                         p->setTrulySNP(true);
00308                                 }
00309                                 if(strProbeSetType == "CN")
00310                                 {
00311                                         p->setTrulyCN(true);
00312                                 }
00313                         }
00314                         else
00315                         {
00316                                 if (bCytoScanHD)
00317                                 {
00318                                         p->setProcessFlag(rset.getInteger(7));
00319                                         strProbeSetType = rset.getString(9);
00320                                         if(strProbeSetType == "SNP")
00321                                         {
00322                                                 p->setTrulySNP(true);
00323                                         }
00324                                         if(strProbeSetType == "CN")
00325                                         {
00326                                                 p->setTrulyCN(true);
00327                                         }
00328                                 }
00329                                 else
00330                                 {
00331                                         if (strProbeSetName.startsWith("SNP"))
00332                                         {
00333                                                 p->setProcessFlag(3);
00334                                                 p->setTrulySNP(true);
00335                                         }
00336                                         else
00337                                         {
00338                                                 p->setProcessFlag(1);
00339                                                 p->setTrulyCN(true);
00340                                         }
00341                                 }
00342                         }
00343 
00344             p->setChromosome(rset.getInteger(1));
00345             p->setPosition(rset.getInteger(2));
00346             double gcContent = rset.getDouble(3);
00347             if (bInWorkflowEngine && (gcContent != gcContent)) { p->setGCContent(0.0f); }
00348             else  { p->setGCContent((float)gcContent); }
00349             p->setPseudoAutosomalRegion(rset.getInteger(4) > 0);
00350                         if (bCytoScanHD) {p->setReplicateCount(rset.getInteger(8));}
00351                         else {p->setReplicateCount(rset.getInteger(7));}
00352             float probe_gc_a = 0.0f;
00353             if (!bCyto2)
00354             {
00355                 AffxString strFragment = rset.getString(6);
00356                 strFragment.removeSurroundingQuotes();
00357                 char nspIcode = parseAdapterCode(strFragment, "NspI", vNspAdapters);
00358                 p->setStyAdapterCode(parseAdapterCode(strFragment, "StyI", vStyAdapters));
00359                 p->setNspAdapterCode(nspIcode);
00360                 if (!bCytoScanHD)
00361                 {
00362                     bSnpInterference = (rset.getInteger(7) == 1);
00363                 }
00364                 else
00365                 {
00366                     bSnpInterference = false;
00367 
00368                     probe_gc_a = (float)rset.getDouble(10);
00369                     double fragmentGC = rset.getDouble(11);
00370 
00371                     // Allocate space and assign initial NaN value for all covariates.
00372                     if (CovariateParams::m_allCovariateMap.size() > 0)
00373                     {
00374                         p->setCovariateValue(CovariateParams::m_allCovariateMap.size()-1, std::numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN());
00375                     }
00376                     // Add covariate information.
00377                     if (fragmentAdapterTypeIndex > -1)
00378                     {
00379                         p->setCovariateValue(fragmentAdapterTypeIndex, 
00380                             ((nspIcode == -1) ? std::numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN() : nspIcode));
00381                     }
00382                     if (fragmentLengthIndex > -1) 
00383                     {
00384                         int fragmentLength = parseFragmentLength(strFragment);
00385                         p->setCovariateValue(fragmentLengthIndex, 
00386                             ((fragmentLength == -1) ? std::numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN() : fragmentLength));
00387                     }
00388                     if (probeGCIndex > -1) p->setCovariateValue(probeGCIndex, probe_gc_a);
00389                     if (localGCIndex > -1) p->setCovariateValue(localGCIndex, gcContent);
00390                     if (fragmentGCIndex > -1) p->setCovariateValue(fragmentGCIndex, fragmentGC);
00391                     if (markerClassIndex > -1) p->setCovariateValue(markerClassIndex, (p->processAsSNPNormalize() ? 3.f :
00392                                                                                           (p->processAsCNNormalize() ? 1.f :
00393                                                                                               std::numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN())));
00394                 }
00395             }
00396             else
00397             {
00398                 p->setStyAdapterCode(-1);
00399                 p->setNspAdapterCode(-1);
00400                 bSnpInterference = false;
00401             }
00402             bool bBadAnnotation = false;
00403             if (cChromosome == 'X') {p->setChromosome(iXChromosome);}
00404             else if (cChromosome == 'Y') {p->setChromosome(iYChromosome);}
00405             if (!bCyto2)
00406             {
00407                 if ((cChromosome == 'M') || (cChromosome == 'm')) {p->setChromosome(0);}
00408                 if (p->getPosition() == 0) {bBadAnnotation = true;}
00409                 if (p->getGCContent() == 0) {bBadAnnotation = true;}                    // SNP6
00410                 if (p->getGCContent() != p->getGCContent()) {bBadAnnotation = true;}    // CytoScanHD
00411                 if ((bEnzymes) && (!p->isSty()) && (!p->isNsp())) {bBadAnnotation = true;}
00412                 if (bSnpInterference) {bBadAnnotation = true;}
00413                 if (probe_gc_a != probe_gc_a) {bBadAnnotation = true;}
00414                 if (bCytoScanHD && strProbeSetType == "") {bBadAnnotation = true;}
00415             }
00416             if (p->getChromosome() == 0) {bBadAnnotation = true;}
00417             if (!bBadAnnotation)
00418             {
00419                 uiProbeSetIndex++;
00420             }
00421             else
00422             {
00423                 p->clear();
00424             }
00425         }
00426         rset.close();
00427         Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
00428     }
00429 
00430     close();
00431     }
00432     catch (Except&) {
00433         vStyAdapters.deleteAll();
00434         vNspAdapters.deleteAll();
00435         arRestrictList.deleteAll();
00436         close();
00437         throw;
00438     }
00439     catch (SQLiteException& e)
00440     {
00441         vStyAdapters.deleteAll();
00442         vNspAdapters.deleteAll();
00443         arRestrictList.deleteAll();
00444         close();
00445         Verbose::out(1, "*"); Verbose::out(1, strSQL2);  Verbose::out(1, "*"); throw(Except(e.getMessage()));
00446     }
00447     catch (...)
00448     {
00449         vStyAdapters.deleteAll();
00450         vNspAdapters.deleteAll();
00451         arRestrictList.deleteAll();
00452         close();
00453         throw(Except("Unknown exception during Annotation processing. ProbeSetIndex = " + ToStr(uiProbeSetIndex) + ", RowCount = " + ToStr(uiRowCount)));
00454     }
00455 
00456     vStyAdapters.deleteAll();
00457     vNspAdapters.deleteAll();
00458     arRestrictList.deleteAll();
00459 }
00460 
00461 void Annotation::newCNProbeSetsHDF5(BaseEngine& engine, AffxSplitArray<CNProbeSet> &vProbeSets)
00462 {
00463     AffxString strFileName = engine.getOpt("annotation-file");
00464     vProbeSets.clear();
00465     m_vParams.clear();
00466 
00467     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00468     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-algorithm-param-genome-version-ucsc"));
00469     param.SetValueAscii("hg18");
00470     m_vParams.push_back(param);
00471     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-algorithm-param-dbsnp-version"));
00472     param.SetValueAscii("128");
00473     m_vParams.push_back(param);
00474     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-algorithm-param-netaffx-build"));
00475     param.SetValueAscii("26.1");
00476     m_vParams.push_back(param);
00477 
00478     AffxArray<AffxString> arRestrictList;
00479     bool bRestrictList = (engine.getOpt("probeset-ids") != "");
00480     if (bRestrictList)
00481     {
00482         loadProbeSetNamesFromRestrictList(engine, arRestrictList);
00483     }
00484 
00485     AffxByteArray ba;
00486     AffxString str;
00487     AffxString strProbeSetName;
00488     bool bSnpInterference = false;
00489     int iSearchIndex = 0;
00490     unsigned int uiProbeSetIndex = 0;
00491 
00492     affx::File5_File file5;
00493     affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
00494     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00495 
00496     file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00497     group5 = file5.openGroup("Annotation", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00498     tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Annotation", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00499     unsigned int uiRowCount = 0;
00500     while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00501     {
00502         uiRowCount++;
00503     }
00504     tsv5->close();
00505     delete tsv5;
00506     int i = 0;
00507     double d = 0;
00508     if (uiRowCount > 0)
00509     {
00510         vProbeSets.allocate(uiRowCount);
00511         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Annotation", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00512         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00513         {
00514             tsv5->get(0, 0, &str);
00515 
00516             CNProbeSet* p = vProbeSets.getAt(uiProbeSetIndex);
00517             if (arRestrictList.getCount() > 0)
00518             {
00519                 iSearchIndex = arRestrictList.binarySearch(str, 0);
00520                 if (iSearchIndex == -1) {p->setProcess(false);}
00521                 else {p->setProcess(true);}
00522             }
00523             p->setProbeSetName(str);
00524             p->setProcessFlag(((str.startsWith("SNP")) || (str.startsWith("rs")) || (str.startsWith("S-")) ? 3 : 1));
00525             tsv5->get(0, 1, &i); p->setChromosome(i);
00526             tsv5->get(0, 2, &i); p->setPosition(i);
00527             tsv5->get(0, 3, &d); p->setGCContent((float)d);
00528             if (p->getGCContent() > 1) {p->setGCContent(p->getGCContent() / 49.0);}
00529             tsv5->get(0, 4, &i);
00530             p->setPseudoAutosomalRegion(i == 1);
00531             bSnpInterference = false;
00532             p->setStyAdapterCode(-1);
00533             p->setNspAdapterCode(-1);
00534 
00535             uiProbeSetIndex++;
00536         }
00537         tsv5->close();
00538         delete tsv5;
00539     }
00540 
00541     group5->close();
00542     delete group5;
00543     file5.close();
00544 
00545     arRestrictList.deleteAll();
00546 }
00547 
00548 void Annotation::loadAnnotationSQLite(BaseEngine& engine, AffxArray<CNProbeSet>& arProbeSets)
00549 {
00550     int iXChromosome = engine.getOptInt("xChromosome");
00551     int iYChromosome = engine.getOptInt("yChromosome");
00552     AffxArray<AffxString> vStyAdapters;
00553     AffxArray<AffxString> vNspAdapters;
00554 
00555     AffxString strFileName = engine.getOpt("annotation-file");
00556     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName)) {return loadAnnotationHDF5(engine, arProbeSets);}
00557     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00558     CNProbeSet objSearch;
00559     int iSearchIndex = -1;
00560     AffxString str;
00561     AffxByteArray ba;
00562     m_vParams.clear();
00563 
00564     AffxString strSQL1;
00565     AffxString strSQL2;
00566     AffxString strSQL3;
00567     try    {
00568     open(strFileName);
00569     SQLiteRecordset rset(*this);
00570 
00571     strSQL2 = "select key, value from information";
00572     rset.open(strSQL2);
00573     int iKeyCount = 0;
00574     while (rset.fetch())
00575     {
00576         ba.assign(rset.getString(0));
00577         ba.replace(" ", "-");
00578         ba.replace("_", "-");
00579         ba.replace("netaffx-annotation-netaffx-build", "netaffx-build");
00580         if (ba.equals("genome-version-ucsc")) {iKeyCount++;}
00581         if (ba.equals("dbsnp-version")) {iKeyCount++;}
00582         if (ba.equals("netaffx-build")) {iKeyCount++;}
00583         param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-algorithm-param-" + ba.toString()));
00584         param.SetValueAscii(rset.getString(1));
00585         m_vParams.push_back(param);
00586     }
00587     rset.close();
00588     if (iKeyCount < 3) {throw(Except("The annotation file must contain all three of these parameters: genome-version-ucsc, dbsnp-version, and netaffx-build"));}
00589 
00590     strSQL1 = "select probeSet_ID, chr_id, start, Percent_GC, chrx_par, Chromosome.shortname, process_flag, probe_count,ProbeSet_Type from Annotations, Chromosome where Annotations.chr_id = Chromosome.key ";
00591     strSQL2 = "select probeSet_ID, chr_id, start, Percent_GC, chrx_par, Chromosome.shortname, enzyme_fragment from Annotations, Chromosome where Annotations.chr_id = Chromosome.key and in_final_list = 1";
00592     strSQL3 = "select probeSet_ID, chr_id, start, Percent_GC, chrx_par, Chromosome.shortname, enzyme_fragment, process_flag, probe_count, probeset_type, probe_gc_a from Annotations, Chromosome where Annotations.chr_id = Chromosome.key";
00593     bool bCyto2 = false;
00594         bool bCytoScanHD = false;
00595         try {rset.open(strSQL3); bCyto2 = false; bCytoScanHD = true;} 
00596         catch(...) 
00597         {
00598                 try {rset.open(strSQL1); bCyto2 = true;} 
00599                 catch(...) 
00600                 {
00601                         rset.open(strSQL2); bCyto2 = false;
00602                 }
00603         }
00604     AffxString strChromosome;
00605     char cChromosome = 0;
00606     Verbose::out(1, "MAJOR PROGRESS UPDATE: Begin Loading Annotations file.");
00607     Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Annotation::loadAnnotationSQLite(...) ", (arProbeSets.getCount() / 100000), 1, (arProbeSets.getCount() / 100000));
00608     int i = 0;
00609     while (rset.fetch())
00610     {
00611         if ((i % 100000) == 0) {Verbose::progressStep(1);}
00612         i++;
00613         strChromosome = rset.getString(5);
00614         if (strChromosome.length() > 0) {cChromosome = strChromosome.getAt(0);}
00615         str = rset.getString(0);
00616         str.removeSurroundingQuotes();
00617         objSearch.setProbeSetName(str);
00618         iSearchIndex = arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
00619                 if(iSearchIndex == -1)
00620                 {
00621                         int i=0;
00622                          i++;
00623                 }
00624 
00625 
00626 
00627         if (iSearchIndex == -1) {continue;}
00628 
00629         CNProbeSet* p = arProbeSets.getAt(iSearchIndex);
00630         p->setProbeSetName(str);
00631         if (bCyto2)
00632         {
00633             p->setProcessFlag(rset.getInteger(6));
00634             std::string strProbeSetType = rset.getString(8);
00635             if(strProbeSetType == "SNP")
00636             {
00637                 p->setTrulySNP(true);
00638             }
00639             if(strProbeSetType == "CN")
00640             { 
00641                 p->setTrulyCN(true);
00642             }
00643         }
00644         else
00645         {
00646                         if (bCytoScanHD)
00647                         {
00648                                 p->setProcessFlag(rset.getInteger(7));
00649                                 std::string strProbeSetType = rset.getString(9);
00650                 if (strProbeSetType.empty()) { p->setProcessFlag(0); }
00651                                 if(strProbeSetType == "SNP")
00652                                 {
00653                                         p->setTrulySNP(true);
00654                                 }
00655                                 if(strProbeSetType == "CN")
00656                                 {       
00657                                         p->setTrulyCN(true);
00658                                 }
00659                         }
00660                         else
00661                         {
00662                                 if (str.startsWith("SNP"))
00663                                 {
00664                                         p->setProcessFlag(3);
00665                                         p->setTrulySNP(true);
00666                                 }
00667                                 else
00668                                 {
00669                                         p->setProcessFlag(1);
00670                                         p->setTrulyCN(true);
00671                                 }
00672                         }
00673         }
00674 
00675         if ((bCyto2) || (bCytoScanHD))
00676         {
00677            if ((p->getChromosome() != iXChromosome) && (cChromosome == 'X'))
00678            {
00679                         p->setProcessFlag(0);
00680            }
00681 
00682            if ((p->getChromosome() != iYChromosome) && (cChromosome == 'Y'))
00683            {
00684                p->setProcessFlag(0);
00685            }
00686         }
00687 
00688         p->setChromosome(rset.getInteger(1));
00689         if (cChromosome == 'X') {p->setChromosome(iXChromosome);}
00690         else if (cChromosome == 'Y') {p->setChromosome(iYChromosome);}
00691         else if ((cChromosome == 'M') || (cChromosome == 'm')) {p->setChromosome(0);}
00692         p->setPosition(rset.getInteger(2));
00693         p->setGCContent((float)rset.getDouble(3));
00694                 if (bCytoScanHD) {p->setReplicateCount(rset.getInteger(8));}
00695                 else {p->setReplicateCount(rset.getInteger(7));}
00696         p->setPseudoAutosomalRegion(rset.getInteger(4) > 0);
00697         if (!bCyto2)
00698         {
00699             str = rset.getString(6);
00700             if (bCytoScanHD && str.empty()) { p->setProcessFlag(0); }
00701             str.removeSurroundingQuotes();
00702             p->setStyAdapterCode(parseAdapterCode(str, "StyI", vStyAdapters));
00703             p->setNspAdapterCode(parseAdapterCode(str, "NspI", vNspAdapters));
00704         }
00705         else
00706         {
00707             p->setStyAdapterCode(-1);
00708             p->setNspAdapterCode(-1);
00709         }
00710 
00711         if (bCytoScanHD)
00712         {
00713             if (p->getPosition() == 0) { p->setProcessFlag(0); }
00714             if (p->getGCContent() != p->getGCContent()) { p->setProcessFlag(0); }
00715         }
00716     }
00717     rset.close();
00718     Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
00719     Verbose::out(1, "MAJOR PROGRESS UPDATE: End Loading Annotations file.");
00720 
00721     close();
00722     }
00723     catch (SQLiteException& e)
00724     {
00725         vStyAdapters.deleteAll();
00726         vNspAdapters.deleteAll();
00727         close();
00728         Verbose::out(1, "*"); Verbose::out(1, strSQL2);  Verbose::out(1, "*");
00729         throw(Except(e.getMessage()));
00730     }
00731     catch (...)
00732     {
00733         vStyAdapters.deleteAll();
00734         vNspAdapters.deleteAll();
00735         close();
00736         throw(Except("Unknown exception during Annotation processing."));
00737     }
00738 
00739     vStyAdapters.deleteAll();
00740     vNspAdapters.deleteAll();
00741 }
00742 
00743 void Annotation::loadAnnotationHDF5(BaseEngine& engine, AffxArray<CNProbeSet>& arProbeSets)
00744 {
00745     AffxString strFileName = engine.getOpt("annotation-file");
00746     CNProbeSet objSearch;
00747     int iSearchIndex = -1;
00748     AffxString str;
00749     AffxByteArray ba;
00750     m_vParams.clear();
00751 
00752     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00753     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-algorithm-param-genome-version-ucsc"));
00754     param.SetValueAscii("hg18");
00755     m_vParams.push_back(param);
00756     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-algorithm-param-dbsnp-version"));
00757     param.SetValueAscii("128");
00758     m_vParams.push_back(param);
00759     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-algorithm-param-netaffx-build"));
00760     param.SetValueAscii("26.1");
00761     m_vParams.push_back(param);
00762 
00763     affx::File5_File file5;
00764     affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
00765     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00766 
00767     file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00768     group5 = file5.openGroup("Annotation", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00769     tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Annotation", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00770     unsigned int uiRowCount = 0;
00771     while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00772     {
00773         uiRowCount++;
00774     }
00775     tsv5->close();
00776     delete tsv5;
00777     int i = 0;
00778     double d = 0;
00779     if (uiRowCount > 0)
00780     {
00781         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Annotation", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00782         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00783         {
00784             tsv5->get(0, 0, &str);
00785             objSearch.setProbeSetName(str);
00786             iSearchIndex = arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
00787             if (iSearchIndex == -1) {continue;}
00788 
00789             CNProbeSet* p = arProbeSets.getAt(iSearchIndex);
00790             p->setProbeSetName(str);
00791             p->setProcessFlag(((str.startsWith("SNP")) || (str.startsWith("rs")) || (str.startsWith("S-")) ? 3 : 1));
00792             tsv5->get(0, 1, &i); p->setChromosome(i);
00793             tsv5->get(0, 2, &i); p->setPosition(i);
00794             tsv5->get(0, 3, &d); p->setGCContent((float)d);
00795             if (p->getGCContent() > 1) {p->setGCContent(p->getGCContent() / 49.0);}
00796             tsv5->get(0, 4, &i);
00797             p->setPseudoAutosomalRegion(i == 1);
00798             p->setStyAdapterCode(-1);
00799             p->setNspAdapterCode(-1);
00800         }
00801         tsv5->close();
00802         delete tsv5;
00803     }
00804 
00805     group5->close();
00806     delete group5;
00807     file5.close();
00808 
00809 }
00810 
00811 char Annotation::parseAdapterCode(AffxString& str, const AffxString& strEnzyme, AffxArray<AffxString>& vAdapters)
00812 {
00813     AffxString strAdapter;
00814     char cAdapter = -1;
00815     int iSearchIndex = -1;
00816     int iFindIndex = str.indexOf(strEnzyme);
00817     if (iFindIndex != -1)
00818     {
00819         strAdapter = str.substring(iFindIndex + 8, iFindIndex + 21);
00820         strAdapter = strAdapter.toLowerCase();
00821         for (unsigned int ui = 0; (ui < strAdapter.length()); ui++)
00822         {
00823             if (!strAdapter.isBaseAt(ui))
00824             {
00825                 if (strAdapter.getAt(ui) == '_') {strAdapter.setAt(ui, 'n');}
00826                 else {Err::errAbort("Adapter in Annotation files cannot be processed.");}
00827             }
00828         }
00829         iSearchIndex = -1;
00830         for (int i = 0; (i < vAdapters.getCount()); i++)
00831         {
00832             if (*vAdapters.getAt(i) == strAdapter)
00833             {
00834                 iSearchIndex = i;
00835                 break;
00836             }
00837         }
00838         if (iSearchIndex == -1)
00839         {
00840             try {strAdapter = strAdapter.reverseComplement();} catch(...) {Err::errAbort("Adapter in Annotation files cannot be processed.");}
00841             iSearchIndex = -1;
00842             for (int i = 0; (i < vAdapters.getCount()); i++)
00843             {
00844                 if (*vAdapters.getAt(i) == strAdapter)
00845                 {
00846                     iSearchIndex = i;
00847                     break;
00848                 }
00849             }
00850         }
00851         if (iSearchIndex == -1)
00852         {
00853             vAdapters.add(new AffxString(strAdapter));
00854             cAdapter = (char)(vAdapters.getCount() - 1);
00855         }
00856         else
00857         {
00858             cAdapter = (char)iSearchIndex;
00859         }
00860     }
00861     return cAdapter;
00862 }
00863 
00864 /**
00865  * @brief Load the probe set names from the restrict list file
00866  * @param const AffxString& - The signal summary file name
00867  * @param AffxArray<AffxString>& - The vector to load the string values into
00868  */
00869 void Annotation::loadProbeSetNamesFromRestrictList(BaseEngine& engine, AffxArray<AffxString>& ar)
00870 {
00871   AffxString strProbeListFileName = engine.getOpt("probeset-ids");
00872   if (strProbeListFileName == "") {
00873     return;
00874   }
00875   affx::TsvFile tsv;
00876   tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00877   tsv.open(strProbeListFileName);
00878   std::string strProbeSetName;
00879   tsv.bind(0,0,&strProbeSetName, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00880   while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK)  {
00881     ar.add(new AffxString(strProbeSetName));
00882   }
00883   tsv.clear();
00884   ar.quickSort(0);
00885   return;
00886 }
00887 
00888 int Annotation::loadAnnotationForAdapterTypeNormTran(const std::string& strFileName, ChipLayout& layout, AffxMultiDimensionalArray<char>& mxAdapterProbeTypes, AffxMultiDimensionalArray<char>& mxAdapterNspTypes, AffxMultiDimensionalArray<char>& mxAdapterStyTypes)
00889 {
00890     int iMaxAdapterCode = 0;
00891     AffxArray<AffxString> vStyAdapters;
00892     AffxArray<AffxString> vNspAdapters;
00893 
00894     AffxString strSQL;
00895     AffxString strSQL1;
00896     AffxString strSQL2;
00897     
00898     try    {
00899     open(strFileName);
00900     SQLiteRecordset rset(*this);
00901 
00902     AffxString strProbeSetName;
00903     AffxString tmpStr;
00904         bool bCytoScanHD = false;
00905     strSQL1 = "select snp_interference, probeset_ID, enzyme_fragment from Annotations where in_final_list = 1";
00906     strSQL2 = "select snp_interference, probeset_ID, enzyme_fragment, probeset_type from Annotations where process_flag > 0";
00907         try {rset.open(strSQL1); strSQL = strSQL1;} catch(...) {rset.open(strSQL2); strSQL = strSQL2; bCytoScanHD = true;}
00908     while (rset.fetch())
00909     {
00910         bool bSnpInterference = (rset.getInteger(0) == 1);
00911         strProbeSetName = rset.getString(1);
00912         strProbeSetName.removeSurroundingQuotes();
00913         tmpStr = rset.getString(2);
00914         tmpStr.removeSurroundingQuotes();
00915         bool bSnp = ((strProbeSetName.find("SNP") != std::string::npos) ? true : false);
00916                 if (bCytoScanHD) {bSnp = ((rset.getString(3) == "SNP") ? true : false);}
00917         if (layout.containsProbeSet(strProbeSetName))
00918         {
00919             ProbeListPacked pList = layout.getProbeListByName(strProbeSetName);
00920             if (!pList.isNull())
00921             {
00922                 ProbeSet* ps = ProbeListFactory::asProbeSet(pList);
00923                 for (unsigned int iAtomIndex = 0; (iAtomIndex < ps->atoms.size()); iAtomIndex++)
00924                 {
00925                     for (unsigned int iProbeIndex = 0; (iProbeIndex < ps->atoms[iAtomIndex]->probes.size()); iProbeIndex++)
00926                     {
00927                         if (Probe::isPm(*ps->atoms[iAtomIndex]->probes[iProbeIndex]))
00928                         {
00929                             int iIndex = ps->atoms[iAtomIndex]->probes[iProbeIndex]->id;
00930                             mxAdapterProbeTypes.set(iIndex, (char)(bSnp ? 1 : 2));
00931                             if (!bSnpInterference)
00932                             {
00933                                 mxAdapterNspTypes.set(iIndex, parseAdapterCode(tmpStr, "NspI", vNspAdapters));
00934                                 mxAdapterStyTypes.set(iIndex, parseAdapterCode(tmpStr, "StyI", vStyAdapters));
00935                                 iMaxAdapterCode = Max(iMaxAdapterCode, (int)mxAdapterNspTypes.get(iIndex));
00936                                 iMaxAdapterCode = Max(iMaxAdapterCode, (int)mxAdapterStyTypes.get(iIndex));
00937                             }
00938                         }
00939                     }
00940                 }
00941                 delete ps;
00942             }
00943         }
00944     }
00945     rset.close();
00946 
00947     close();
00948     }
00949     catch (SQLiteException& e)
00950     {
00951         vStyAdapters.deleteAll();
00952         vNspAdapters.deleteAll();
00953         close();
00954         Verbose::out(1, "*"); Verbose::out(1, strSQL);  Verbose::out(1, "*");
00955         throw(Except(e.getMessage()));
00956     }
00957     catch (...)
00958     {
00959         vStyAdapters.deleteAll();
00960         vNspAdapters.deleteAll();
00961         close();
00962         throw(Except("Unknown exception during Annotation processing."));
00963     }
00964     vStyAdapters.deleteAll();
00965     vNspAdapters.deleteAll();
00966 
00967     return iMaxAdapterCode;
00968 }
00969 
00970 int Annotation::parseFragmentLength(AffxString& str)
00971 {
00972     int fragmentLen = -1;
00973     AffxString strTmp = str;
00974     int iStartIndex = str.indexOf("//");
00975     for (int i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
00976     {
00977         if (iStartIndex == -1) return -1;
00978         iStartIndex = str.nextIndexOf("//", iStartIndex);
00979     }
00980     if (iStartIndex != -1)
00981     {
00982         int iEndIndex = str.nextIndexOf("//", iStartIndex);
00983         if (iEndIndex == -1) return -1;
00984         AffxString tmp = str.substring(iStartIndex+2, iEndIndex);
00985         int startPos = Convert::toInt(tmp.trim());
00986 
00987         iStartIndex = iEndIndex;
00988         iEndIndex = str.nextIndexOf("//", iStartIndex);
00989         if (iEndIndex == -1)
00990             tmp = str.substring(iStartIndex+2);
00991         else
00992             tmp = str.substring(iStartIndex+2, iEndIndex);
00993         int endPos = Convert::toInt(tmp.trim());
00994         fragmentLen = endPos - startPos;
00995     }
00996     return fragmentLen;
00997 }
